headline: Allot Rises 21% in 6 Months: Should You Buy the Stock Right Now?
summary: ALLT shares climb 20.6% in six months as surging SECaaS adoption, raised guidance and improving recurring revenue strengthen Allot's growth outlook.

headline: VC firm Superorganism raises over $25M to back biodiversity startups
summary: The venture capital firm will look to expand its portfolio from 20 startups to 35 through its debut fund, its co-founders told ESG Dive.

headline: FRC Appoints Christopher Lynch to Board of Directors, Strengthening Data and AI Leadership
summary: FRC today announced the appointment of Christopher Lynch to its Board of Directors. Lynch joins Executive Chairman Alan Marc Smith, further strengthening the company's strategic leadership, governance, and long-term growth focus.

raw.headline: FRC Appoints Christopher Lynch to Board of Directors, Strengthening Data and AI Leadership
raw.summary: FRC today announced the appointment of Christopher Lynch to its Board of Directors. Lynch joins Executive Chairman Alan Marc Smith, further strengthening the company's strategic leadership, governance, and long-term growth focus.

headline: How Investors May Respond To Cisco (CSCO) Supreme Court Appeal On Alleged Human Rights Abuses
summary: Cisco Systems is facing renewed attention after asking the U.S. Supreme Court to dismiss a lawsuit alleging its technology enabled human rights abuses against Falun Gong practitioners in China under the Alien Tort Statute and Torture Victim Protection Act. At the same time, media focus on Cisco’s record operational cycle and legal exposure is prompting investors to reassess how flat sales, pressured free cash flow margins and potential reputational risks fit with the company’s longer-term...
